mapper.insert: insert into tmi_member values ( seq_m_no.nextval, #{mEmail}, #{mNickName}, #{mPassword}, #{mName}, #{mPhone}, default)
mapper.update: update tmi_member set m_nickname = #{mNickName}, m_name = #{mName}, m_phone = #{mPhone} where m_email = #{mEmail}
mapper.select: select * from ( select * from tmi_planner_board where pb_m_email = #{pbMEmail} union all select * from tmi_review_board where rb_m_email = #{rbMEmail} union all select * from tmi_friend_board where fb_m_email = #{fbMEmail}) order by pb_created_at desc

select count(*) from ( select * from tmi_planner_board where pb_m_email = #{pbMEmail} union all select * from tmi_review_board where rb_m_email = #{rbMEmail} union all select * from tmi_friend_board where fb_m_email = #{fbMEmail})

select fb.fbNo, fb.fbPNo, m.mNickname, fb.fbTitle, fb.fbContent, fb.fbCreatedAt, fb.fbUpdatedAt, fb.fbReadCount, from tmi_friend_board fb join tmi_member m on fb_m_email = m.m_email where fb_m_email = #{fbMEmail} order by fb_created_at desc
select count(*) from tmi_friend_board where fb_m_email = #{fbMEmail}
